quiz.question: ____ preface
quiz.explanation: 序言，书的序言。The author wrote a thoughtful book preface explaining his motivations. 作者写了一篇深思熟虑的书的序言解释他的动机。

quiz.question: efface _ ______
quiz.explanation: 抹去，抹去记忆。Time cannot efface a memory of such profound loss. 时间无法抹去如此深刻损失的记忆。

quiz.question: commonplace _____
quiz.explanation: 平凡的，平凡的真理。It is a commonplace truth that practice makes perfect. 熟能生巧是平凡的真理。

quiz.question: displace _________
quiz.explanation: 取代，取代居民。The dam construction would displace residents from their homes. 大坝建设会将居民从家园中取代。

quiz.question: _______ interlace
quiz.explanation: 交织，线交织。The colorful threads interlace to form a beautiful pattern. 彩色的线交织形成美丽的图案。

quiz.question: _____ populace
quiz.explanation: 民众，城市民众。The urban populace demanded better public services. 城市民众要求更好的公共服务。

quiz.question: _______ menace
quiz.explanation: 威胁，迫在眉睫的威胁。A looming menace threatened the peace of the region. 迫在眉睫的威胁威胁着该地区的和平。

quiz.question: _____ furnace
quiz.explanation: 熔炉，高炉。The blast furnace produced molten iron. 高炉生产熔铁。

quiz.question: ________ carapace
quiz.explanation: 甲壳，乌龟甲壳。The tortoise carapace provided protection. 乌龟甲壳提供保护。

quiz.question: brace _______
quiz.explanation: 支撑，支撑自己。You must brace oneself for bad news. 你必须支撑自己准备接受坏消息。

quiz.question: ____ embrace
quiz.explanation: 拥抱，温暖的拥抱。She greeted him with a warm embrace. 她用温暖的拥抱迎接他。

quiz.question: terrace ______
quiz.explanation: 梯田，梯田花园。The terrace garden overlooked the valley. 梯田花园俯瞰山谷。

quiz.question: _____ ___ fleece
quiz.explanation: 羊毛，剪羊毛。The farmers would shear the fleece in spring. 农民们会在春天剪羊毛。

quiz.question: ______ jaundice
quiz.explanation: 黄疸，婴儿黄疸。The doctor treated the infant jaundice with phototherapy. 医生用光疗治疗婴儿黄疸。

quiz.question: ______ prejudice
quiz.explanation: 偏见，种族偏见。The civil rights movement fought against racial prejudice. 民权运动反对种族偏见。

quiz.question: _____ edifice
quiz.explanation: 大厦，石头大厦。The ancient stone edifice stood for centuries. 古老的石头大厦屹立了几个世纪。

quiz.question: ____ orifice
quiz.explanation: 孔，口腔孔。The oral orifice is the entrance to the digestive system. 口腔孔是消化系统的入口。

quiz.question: ______ artifice
quiz.explanation: 技巧，巧妙的技巧。He used clever artifice to solve the problem. 他用巧妙的技巧解决了问题。

quiz.question: ______ chalice
quiz.explanation: 圣杯，银圣杯。The priest raised the silver chalice. 牧师举起银圣杯。

quiz.question: accomplice __ _____
quiz.explanation: 共犯，犯罪共犯。He was charged as an accomplice to crime. 他被指控为犯罪共犯。

quiz.question: splice _____
quiz.explanation: 拼接，拼接电线。The electrician would splice wires together. 电工会把电线拼接在一起。

quiz.question: _____ slice
quiz.explanation: 片，披萨片。He ate a large pizza slice. 他吃了一大片披萨片。

quiz.question: _____ cornice
quiz.explanation: 檐口，石头檐口。The stone cornice decorated the building's edge. 石头檐口装饰着建筑的边缘。

quiz.question: _______ choice
quiz.explanation: 选择，有限的选择。They had limited choice of restaurants. 他们有有限的选择餐厅。

quiz.question: rejoice __ ____
quiz.explanation: 欢喜，对消息欢喜。The family would rejoice at news of the baby's birth. 家人会对婴儿出生的消息欢喜。

quiz.question: _____ precipice
quiz.explanation: 悬崖，陡峭的悬崖。They stood at the edge of a sheer precipice. 他们站在陡峭的悬崖边上。

quiz.question: _____ ___ auspice(s)
quiz.explanation: 赞助，在赞助下。The event was held under the auspice(s) of the university. 活动在大学的赞助下举行。

quiz.question: ____ avarice
quiz.explanation: 贪婪，极度的贪婪。His rank avarice led to his downfall. 他极度的贪婪导致了他的垮台。

quiz.question: ______ caprice
quiz.explanation: 任性，突然的任性。She acted on a sudden caprice. 她突发奇想突然的任性行事。

quiz.question: _______ malpractice
quiz.explanation: 渎职，医疗渎职。The doctor was sued for medical malpractice. 医生因医疗渎职被起诉。

quiz.question: _____ apprentice
quiz.explanation: 学徒，年轻的学徒。The young apprentice learned from the master craftsman. 年轻的学徒向工匠大师学习。

quiz.question: ____ __ armistice
quiz.explanation: 停战协定，签署停战协定。The warring nations agreed to sign an armistice. 交战国同意签署停战协定。

quiz.question: ______ interstice
quiz.explanation: 缝隙，狭窄的缝隙。Light filtered through the narrow interstice. 光线透过狭窄的缝隙。

quiz.question: ______ lattice
quiz.explanation: 格子，木格子。The wooden lattice provided shade. 木格子提供阴凉。

quiz.question: _____ sluice
quiz.explanation: 水闸，水闸。The water sluice controlled the flow. 水闸控制流量。

quiz.question: ____ crevice
quiz.explanation: 裂缝，岩石裂缝。The lizard hid in a rock crevice. 蜥蜴躲在岩石裂缝里。

quiz.question: novice ______
quiz.explanation: 新手，新手司机。The novice driver was nervous on the highway. 新手司机在高速公路上很紧张。

quiz.question: _____ abundance
quiz.explanation: 丰富，大量丰富。The harvest brought great abundance. 收获带来了大量丰富。

quiz.question: ____ vengeance
quiz.explanation: 复仇，寻求复仇。He swore to seek vengeance for his brother's death. 他发誓要为兄弟的死寻求复仇。

quiz.question: ____ extravagance
quiz.explanation: 奢侈，疯狂的奢侈。His wild extravagance led to bankruptcy. 他疯狂的奢侈导致破产。

quiz.question: _____ arrogance
quiz.explanation: 傲慢，纯粹的傲慢。His sheer arrogance offended everyone. 他纯粹的傲慢冒犯了每个人。

quiz.question: ______ insouciance
quiz.explanation: 漫不经心，随意的漫不经心。She displayed casual insouciance about the problem. 她对问题表现出随意的漫不经心。

quiz.question: ______ allegiance
quiz.explanation: 忠诚，宣誓忠诚。Citizens pledge allegiance to the flag. 公民向国旗宣誓忠诚。

quiz.question: ____ dalliance
quiz.explanation: 调情，闲散的调情。Their idle dalliance meant nothing serious. 他们闲散的调情并不认真。

quiz.question: __ compliance ____
quiz.explanation: 遵守，遵守。The company acted in compliance with regulations. 公司按照法规遵守行事。

quiz.question: ___________ variance
quiz.explanation: 方差，统计方差。The researcher calculated the statistical variance. 研究人员计算了统计方差。

quiz.question: lance _____
quiz.explanation: 长矛，长矛伤口。The knight suffered a lance wound in battle. 骑士在战斗中遭受了长矛伤口。

quiz.question: counterbalance ____
quiz.explanation: 平衡，平衡风险。Diversification can counterbalance risk in investments. 多样化可以平衡投资风险。

quiz.question: ____ nonchalance
quiz.explanation: 冷淡，冷静的冷淡。He faced danger with cool nonchalance. 他以冷静的冷淡面对危险。

quiz.question: _ ____ semblance
quiz.explanation: 外表，仅仅是外表。Their relationship was a mere semblance of friendship. 他们的关系仅仅是友谊的外表。

quiz.question: ______ parlance
quiz.explanation: 说法，普通说法。In common parlance, this is called a bug. 在普通说法中，这被称为漏洞。

quiz.question: ________ petulance
quiz.explanation: 任性，幼稚的任性。His childish petulance irritated everyone. 他幼稚的任性激怒了每个人。

quiz.question: ________ ordnance
quiz.explanation: 军械，军事军械。The base stored military ordnance. 基地储存军事军械。

quiz.question: _______ penance
quiz.explanation: 忏悔，进行忏悔。The sinner had to perform penance. 罪人必须进行忏悔。

quiz.question: ____ maintenance
quiz.explanation: 维护，家庭维护。Regular home maintenance prevents costly repairs. 定期家庭维护可以防止昂贵的维修。

quiz.question: ____ countenance
quiz.explanation: 面容，平静的面容。She maintained a calm countenance despite the stress. 尽管有压力，她保持着平静的面容。

quiz.question: _____ sustenance
quiz.explanation: 食物，日常食物。Bread provides daily sustenance. 面包提供日常食物。

quiz.question: ___ provenance
quiz.explanation: 来源，艺术来源。The museum verified the art provenance. 博物馆核实了艺术来源。

quiz.question: ______ repugnance
quiz.explanation: 厌恶，强烈的厌恶。She felt strong repugnance toward violence. 她对暴力感到强烈的厌恶。

quiz.question: ____ ordinance
quiz.explanation: 法令，城市法令。The city ordinance banned smoking in parks. 城市法令禁止在公园吸烟。

quiz.question: _____ consonance
quiz.explanation: 和谐，甜美的和谐。The choir sang in sweet consonance. 合唱团唱出甜美的和谐。

quiz.question: _________ governance
quiz.explanation: 治理，企业治理。Good corporate governance ensures accountability. 良好的企业治理确保问责制。

quiz.question: ____ forbearance
quiz.explanation: 忍耐，显示忍耐。The teacher would show forbearance with difficult students. 老师会对困难学生显示忍耐。

quiz.question: ________ exuberance
quiz.explanation: 热情，年轻的热情。The children's youthful exuberance was contagious. 孩子们年轻的热情具有感染力。

quiz.question: _________ tolerance
quiz.explanation: 宽容，宗教宽容。The society valued religious tolerance. 社会重视宗教宽容。

quiz.question: _____ fragrance
quiz.explanation: 芳香，甜美的芳香。The roses filled the air with sweet fragrance. 玫瑰让空气中充满甜美的芳香。

quiz.question: __ _ trance
quiz.explanation: 恍惚，处于恍惚中。The hypnotist put him in a trance. 催眠师让他处于恍惚中。

quiz.question: _____ entrance
quiz.explanation: 入口，宏伟的入口。The palace had a grand entrance. 宫殿有宏伟的入口。

quiz.question: ________ malfeasance
quiz.explanation: 渎职，官员渎职。The investigation uncovered official malfeasance. 调查揭露了官员渎职。

quiz.question: _____ complaisance
quiz.explanation: 顺从，安静的顺从。She accepted the decision with quiet complaisance. 她以安静的顺从接受了决定。

quiz.question: ____ obeisance
quiz.explanation: 敬礼，深深的敬礼。The courtier made a deep obeisance to the king. 朝臣向国王行深深的敬礼。

quiz.question: ______ reconnaissance
quiz.explanation: 侦察，空中侦察。The military conducted aerial reconnaissance. 军方进行了空中侦察。

quiz.question: _________ puissance
quiz.explanation: 权力，政治权力。The senator wielded great political puissance. 参议员掌握着巨大的政治权力。

quiz.question: ________ __ impuissance
quiz.explanation: 无力，无力的感觉。He experienced feelings of impuissance. 他经历了无力的感觉。

quiz.question: ____ _ stance
quiz.explanation: 立场，采取立场。The politician refused to take a stance on the issue. 政客拒绝在这个问题上采取立场。

quiz.question: ____ remittance
quiz.explanation: 汇款，银行汇款。The bank remittance arrived on time. 银行汇款按时到达。

quiz.question: _____ pittance
quiz.explanation: 微薄的收入，微薄的收入。He earned a small pittance from the job. 他从这份工作中赚取微薄的收入。

quiz.question: ______ nuance
quiz.explanation: 细微差别，微妙的细微差别。The translation captured every subtle nuance. 翻译捕捉到了每一个微妙的细微差别。

quiz.question: ___ grievance
quiz.explanation: 不满，发泄不满。The workers needed to air grievance with management. 工人们需要向管理层发泄不满。

quiz.question: ______ relevance
quiz.explanation: 相关性，政策相关性。The research has policy relevance for healthcare. 这项研究与医疗保健有政策相关性。

quiz.question: _________ observance
quiz.explanation: 遵守，宗教遵守。Strict religious observance was required. 需要严格的宗教遵守。

quiz.question: _______ allowance
quiz.explanation: 津贴，住房津贴。Employees received a housing allowance. 员工获得住房津贴。

quiz.question: ____ __ abeyance
quiz.explanation: 暂缓，暂缓。The decision was held in abeyance. 决定被暂缓。

quiz.question: ____ __ clairvoyance
quiz.explanation: 预知，预知的天赋。She claimed to have the gift of clairvoyance. 她声称拥有预知的天赋。

quiz.question: ____ cognizance __
quiz.explanation: 认知，认识到。The court must take cognizance of new evidence. 法院必须认识到新证据。

quiz.question: _____ munificence
quiz.explanation: 慷慨，皇家慷慨。The royal munificence supported the arts. 皇家慷慨支持艺术。

quiz.question: _________ innocence
quiz.explanation: 天真，童年天真。Her childhood innocence was touching. 她的童年天真令人感动。

quiz.question: _____ iridescence
quiz.explanation: 彩虹色，珍珠彩虹色。The pearl iridescence shimmered beautifully. 珍珠彩虹色美丽地闪烁。

quiz.question: incandescence ____
quiz.explanation: 白炽，白炽灯。The incandescence lamp glowed warmly. 白炽灯温暖地发光。

quiz.question: opalescence ____
quiz.explanation: 乳白色光泽，乳白色光泽的光芒。The glass had a beautiful opalescence glow. 玻璃有美丽的乳白色光泽的光芒。

quiz.question: ______ intumescence
quiz.explanation: 肿胀，组织肿胀。The injury caused tissue intumescence. 受伤导致组织肿胀。

quiz.question: ______ florescence
quiz.explanation: 开花，花朵开花。The spring brought floral florescence. 春天带来了花朵开花。

quiz.question: ______ cadence
quiz.explanation: 节奏，语言节奏。The speaker's speech cadence was captivating. 演讲者的语言节奏令人着迷。

quiz.question: _____ decadence
quiz.explanation: 堕落，道德堕落。The empire fell into moral decadence. 帝国陷入道德堕落。

quiz.question: ______ antecedence
quiz.explanation: 优先，严格的优先。The rule of strict antecedence was followed. 遵循严格的优先规则。

quiz.question: credence __ _____
quiz.explanation: 信任，相信谣言。Don't give credence to rumor without evidence. 没有证据不要相信谣言。

quiz.question: _______ incidence
quiz.explanation: 发生率，疾病发生率。The disease incidence has increased. 疾病发生率增加了。

quiz.question: ____ prudence
quiz.explanation: 谨慎，显示谨慎。Investors should show prudence in volatile markets. 投资者在波动的市场中应显示谨慎。

quiz.question: ________ jurisprudence
quiz.explanation: 法理学，刑事法理学。He studied criminal jurisprudence at law school. 他在法学院学习刑事法理学。

quiz.question: _____ indigence
quiz.explanation: 贫困，完全的贫困。The family lived in utter indigence. 这家人生活在完全的贫困中。
